name: MAX DEMO
description:
MAX

A COVID PROJECT:

THREE MONTHS AGO I DIDN'T KNOW WHAT UNITY WAS, THREE MONTHS LATER THIS IS WHAT I HAVE.

-------------------------------------

A - LEFT

W - UP

D - RIGHT

S + SPACE BAR - DOWN

SPACE BAR - JUMP

F - DASH

E - SHOOT

R - RELOAD

I - INVENTORY 

U - SWITCH GUN

P - PAUSE

---------------------

THIS IS A DEMO

WILL BE ADDING MORE GUNS AND ANIMATIONS
